GSP30vatnsupu:3: 1cd: sarvatra khecaradṛśā pravirājate yat tan naumi sāhasavaraṃ guruvaktragamyam
GSP30vatnsupu:14_3: kim apy anavakāśaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ sūtramukhenādiśanti
GSP30vatnsupu:17_1: kva cit kadā cid akasmād eva “*mahāsāhasavṛttyā*” ghasmaramahāghanataraparanādollāsasphāreṇa
GSP30vatnsupu:17_4: bhavati iti rahasyārthaḥ / mahāsāhasavṛttyānupraveśaś ca vakṣyamāṇakathitakrameṇādhigantavyaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:21_3: nītāḷ“*pravṛttir*” prakarṣeṇa vartamānā vṛttir satatam acyutatayā tatsamāveśāvasthānam
GSP30vatnsupu:21_4: ity arthaḥ / ity anayoktibhaṅgyā sarvavṛttīnāṃ samanantaram eva sarvottīrṇamahāśūnyatādhāmni
GSP30vatnsupu:21_5: dhāmarūpe tanmayatayā parasparavibhedavigalanenodayapadavyām eva satatam avasthitir sthitetyarthaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:24_1: yā parapade prāptir upadiṣṭā saiva vitatya nirūpyate / saptarandhrakramoditasaptaśikhollāsātmakaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:27: abhidhīyate / tatra “*praveśaḥ*” tatsamāveśatayā sāmarasyāvasthitir saiva prāptamahopadeśanāmāvirbhavatītyarthaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:28_0: itthaṃ mahānayoktadṛśā sarvaśāstraprapañcottīrṇātvād avācyaṃ kim api mahopadeśasākṣātkāram
GSP30vatnsupu:31_1: tatra gandhaprādhānyād dharātattvasya pāyughrāṇarūpeṇa dviprakāratā / aptattvasya
GSP30vatnsupu:31_4: dvidhā gatiḥ / ākāśatattvasya śabdaprādhānyād vākśrotrabhedena dviprakāratayaiva
GSP30vatnsupu:31_5: bahudhātvam / athavā pṛthivyapsvarūpau bhogyasvarūpāvasthitau / tejovāyvākhyau bhoktṛsvabhāvau
GSP30vatnsupu:31_6: saṃsthitau / ākāśaṃ caitad yugmāntarasthaṃ satsuṣiratayā sarvapranāḍikāntaroditaṃ
GSP30vatnsupu:31_7: ca bahudhā vibhaktam / pṛthivyādivāyvantaṃ bhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ bhogyarūpam ākāśaṃ ca
GSP30vatnsupu:31_8: bhoktṛsvabhāvam iti vā / bhogye 'pi bhoktā sadaiva tiṣṭhati;
GSP30vatnsupu:33_0: nityaṃ vibhāti / evamuktayuktyā pratyekaṃ pṛthivyādimahābhūtapañcakaṃ yugmena dvayavibhūtyānārataṃ
GSP30vatnsupu:33_1: prollasatītyabhiprāyaḥ / athavā pratyekaṃ vyaktāvyaktatayā bahirantaratayā śāntodriktatayā
GSP30vatnsupu:33_3: niravakāśā yeyaṃ saṃvit tasyā niṣṭhā samyagaviparyastatayā saṃthitiḥ / niravakāśasaṃvittvena
GSP30vatnsupu:34_0: nāpi nirvikalpasaṃvitsvabhāvena praveśo 'dhigamyate / ittham aprameyatvān niruttaraparamādvayasvabhāvatvāc
GSP30vatnsupu:34_1: ca niravakāśasaṃvid ihocyate / tasyā niṣṭhā varagurupradarśitadṛśā satatam ucyatā
GSP30vatnsupu:34_2: gatir keṣāṃcid bhavatīty arthaḥ / evaṃ dvayātmakakulakaulakavalanena nirupādhinīrūpaniḥsvarūpatādātmyaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:39_0: siddhā ca yoginyaś ca tā siddhayoginyo viṣayakaraṇeśvarīrūpā / tāsāṃ saṃghaṭṭaḥ saṃgamo
GSP30vatnsupu:39_3: satataṃ mahāsāmarasyātmakasya sarvatra pratyakṣatayodayaḥ samullāso bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:43: trikañcukasya bhāvikabhautikaśūnyabhedabhinnasya / tatra bhāvikaṃ śabdādyahaṃkāraparyantaṃ tanmātrarūpaṃ,
GSP30vatnsupu:45: śūnyaṃ nirīhākhyaṃ vāsanāsvarūpaṃ ca / athavā bhāvikaṃ ghaṭākāraṃ bāhyaṃ grāhyaviṣayarūpaṃ,
GSP30vatnsupu:47: śūnyaṃ tadubhayamadhyamākāśam / athavā bhāvikaṃ svapnāvasthā sṛṣṭir ucyate,
GSP30vatnsupu:53: idānīṃ sarvavākprathāsu nirāvaraṇāsu svarabhūtivijṛmbhaiva prathate sadaiva, iti nirūpayanti
GSP30vatnsupu:55_2: pareti prathitā / saiva cānāhatanādasvarūpatām avāptā nirvibhāgadharmiṇī samastavarṇodayaṃ
GSP30vatnsupu:55_3: vaṭadhānikāvad antodhārayantī draṣṭṛsvabhāvā paśyantīti vyapadeśyā / saiva ca saṃkalpavikalpanivahaniścayātmabuddhibhūmiṃ
GSP30vatnsupu:55_6: prakaṭayantī rūpādisamastaviśvaprathāṃ ca vyaktatām āpādayantī vaikharīty uktā / itthaṃ niravakāśāt
GSP30vatnsupu:57: vākcatuṣṭayam aviratam anirodhatayā prathate / evam īdṛksvabhāvavākcatuṣṭayasyodayaś ca virāmaś ca tāvad udayavirāmau sṛṣṭisaṃhārau,
GSP30vatnsupu:58: tayor prathā vyaktāvyaktatayā sadaivāviratam ullasantyaḥ sphurantyaḥ,
GSP30vatnsupu:59_1: eva prakāśitaṃ satatam akaraṇapravṛttyā prayātīty arthaḥ / itthaṃ nānābhedollāsaprakāśarūpeṣu
GSP30vatnsupu:61: iti vākcatuṣṭayodayakrameṇa nirāvaraṇasvarodayaḥ sarvatra sarvakālaṃ sphurati,
GSP30vatnsupu:63: idānīṃ rasatritayābhoge sati paraṃ dhāmaiva niruttaraṃ cakāsti, iti nigadyate
GSP30vatnsupu:65_3: “*paraṃ brahma*” eva satatam anastamitasthityā vijṛmbhatety arthaḥ / etad eva rahasyakrameṇocyate /
GSP30vatnsupu:65_5: payidharas tu payaḥ samastāpyāyakatvāt sarvāśrayasaṃvitsvarūpaṃ tad eva dhārayati
GSP30vatnsupu:65_6: sthitipraroham avalambayati yaḥ spando 'dyonmeṣaiva sarvapadārthāvabhāsanāt sthitirūpaḥ / ādhāras tu
GSP30vatnsupu:66_1: rasarūpaṃ tattadanubhavacamatkārasāmarasyam āsvādya svātmany akṛtakakhamudrānupraveśād vimṛśya,
GSP30vatnsupu:71_0: “*devīcatuṣṭayaṃ*” kṣuttṛḍīrṣyāmananākhyam / tatra ca sarvagrāsaniratatvāt kṣud eva
GSP30vatnsupu:71_1: mahāsaṃhāraḥ / sarvaśoṣakatvāt tṛḍ eva saṃhāraḥ / īrṣyā dvayaprathāpādikā grāhyagrāhakaparigrahagrathitā
GSP30vatnsupu:71_2: sthitirūpā / mananā ca saṃkalpavikalpollāsarūpā sṛṣṭiḥ / etadrūpasya devīcatuṣṭayasya
GSP30vatnsupu:72: ity anena sūtreṇa devīcatuṣṭayakathākramaṃ prakāśya, idānīṃ dvādaśavāhacakrarahasyaṃ nirūpyate
GSP30vatnsupu:76_3: mahāprabodhaḥ satatam avinaśvaratayā sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvadaiva sthiteti mahāvākyārthaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:77: ity akaraṇasiddhaṃ sadaiva nirāvaraṇapadasamāveśaṃ dvādaśavāhodayadṛśā prakāśya,
GSP30vatnsupu:80_3: prathatetyarthaḥ / caryāpañcakakramaṃ ca vitatya nirūpayāmi / tatrānāśritā nirādhāratvāt
GSP30vatnsupu:86_5: jīvata eva vīravarasyāpaścimajanmanaḥ kasya cit sarvakālam akṛtakānubhavarasacarvaṇasaṃtṛptasya
GSP30vatnsupu:86_6: bhavabhūmāv eva bandhamokṣobhayottīrṇamahāmuktir karatalāmalakavat sthitety arthaḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:90: “*akathanakathābalaṃ*” gurumukhopadiṣṭasaṃpradāyakrameṇa manāg iha carcyate / asya akārasya (1)
GSP30vatnsupu:94_1: akathanaṃ / tatra hatas tāvat kathyate hṛtkaṇṭhatālvādisthānakaraṇasaṃniveśair hato
GSP30vatnsupu:95_2: raudrīsvabhāvas turyaḥ / anāhatahataś cānackakalātmakavaktrasaṃsthāno vāmarūpaḥ suṣuptaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:95_3: anāhataś ca bāhurūpāmbikāśaktir yāgame nirūpitā tatsvarūpaḥ svapnaḥ / hataś cāyudhākāro
GSP30vatnsupu:95_4: jyeṣṭhāsvabhāvo jāgrat / ity etaccatuṣṭayasvabhāvasyādyavarṇasya kathanaṃ pāramparyamukhayuktiviśeṣaḥ /
GSP30vatnsupu:95_6: “*akathanakathābalena*” / tatraivam akathanaṃ vākprapañcottīrṇam akathanam eva kathanaṃ
GSP30vatnsupu:96_0: akṛtakasphārasāraṃ / tena saṃkramaṇaṃ ca manāg iha vitanyate / prāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyapramātṛniviniṣṭābhimānavigalanena
GSP30vatnsupu:96_2: kāryakaraṇakarmanirapekṣatayā yad yat kiṃ cit sarvagatātmasvarūpapratipattāv avalokayati
GSP30vatnsupu:96_3: tat tat parataracinmayam eva satataṃ bhavati,
GSP30vatnsupu:97_0: iti nāsty atra sandehaḥ / tathā cānyad vyākhyāntaram āha kathanaṃ tāvat ṣaḍdarśanacaturāmnāyamelāpakramasamūheṣu
GSP30vatnsupu:100_0: mahāvismayaprāptir bhavatīti saṃbandhaḥ / “*mahāvismayaḥ*” ca vigato vinaṣṭaḥ smayo
GSP30vatnsupu:100_1: mitāmitāhaṅkāradarpaḥ sarvollaṅghanavṛttyā svarūpānupraveśaḥ / atha ca mahāvismayaḥ
GSP30vatnsupu:100_4: trayodaśakathākathanasāmarasyātmakaḥ khasvaras tasya bhāvaḥ sāmarasyaprathanaṃ bhavatīty
GSP30vatnsupu:100_5: arthaḥ / khasvaras tu kham api bhāvaśūnyam api svena rāti vyāpnoti svīkarotīty ādatte, iti khasvaraḥ //
GSP30vatnsupu:101_2: prakāśitaḥ / tasyaiveha manāk satām avabodhārtham asmābhir vṛttir iyaṃ kṛteti śivaṃ /
GSP30vatnsupu:104: kṛtam anupamam uccair kena cic cidvikāsāt /
